description: Chinese astilbe (Astilbe chinensis 'Love and Pride') is an amazing plant that guarantees show stopping beauty with its white dainty flowers in the summer. It is a low maintenance plant that is perfect for creating a stunning garden. The foliage is dark green and emerges in early spring. It provides a phenomenal contrast in borders, containers, and can be utilized as a ground cover in shaded areas. It is deer resistant, not prone to pests and diseases, and can thrive in damp conditions. A great choice for woodland gardens, Chinese astilbe provides beauty and is sure to bring love and pride to any garden space!
